channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: UCI Road World Championships
channel.desc: JJ Chalmers presents live coverage of the closing stages of the men's road race at the UCI World Championships in Kigali, Rwanda. Tom Pidcock and Oscar Onley lead the British team on a hilly 267.5km course. Reigning champion Tadej Pogacar of Slovenia and Belgian Olympic champion Remco Evenepoel provide stiff competition on what promises to be a gruelling test of endurance. Plus highlights from the women's road race, where a new name looks set to be crowned world champion.
